title: [BUG] SKCanvas.DrawText seems different than text in XAML elements.
body:
**Description**

SKCanvas.DrawText seems rendering text slightly different than text in XAML elements.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7190183/86263941-86f1c180-bbca-11ea-9218-f80d9376df69.png)

Upper 'EURUSD' is xaml control
Lower EURUSD is SKCanvas.DrawText output

if zoomed in - one can see different shading/coloring of pixels.
Same Font, Height, Color is used in both cases

**Expected Behavior**

Text would appear the same


- Version with issue:  2.80

   - UWP:   16299  

**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7190183/86264429-2f078a80-bbcb-11ea-90fa-0df212e7ed80.png)
